description_text:
Hey I ordered a base plate Christmas Eve and my buddy ordered a set of
pedals like 3 days ago and his is already in Chicago and mine still says
the are in LA? Just trying to see what I need to do here is my order number
SSN5255

conversations.body_text: Hi Raymond Haines,     The tracking information has been updated. Please check the latest status.

I have received it thank you

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 4:43 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Raymond Haines,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
